Name: Rhodeia of Loch
Title: "Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia
Desc: "As long as rain falls and rivers flow... water will exist forever... "
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Rhodeia of Loch

22012.Name: Oceanid Mimic Summoning
22012.Desc: Randomly summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122010]</color> (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of $[C122010] can exist at the same time in the summons area).

C122010.Name: Oceanid Mimic
C122010.Desc:
There are 3 kinds of Oceanid Mimics in total, and up 2 kinds can exist at once:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Squirrel</color>: Deal 2 $[K102] at the End Phase. 2 Usages.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Raptor</color>: Deal 1 $[K102] at the End Phase. 3 Usages.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frog</color>: Can take 1 DMG for active character. 1 Usage. Once this effect is depleted, deal 2 $[K102] during the End Phase.

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>：DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

22013.Name: The Myriad Wilds
22013.Desc: Randomly summons 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122010]</color> (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of $[C122010] can exist at the same time in the summons area).

K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance

{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

22014.Name: Tide and Torrent
22014.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. For each friendly Summon on the field, deals +1 additional DMG.
